title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not change immediately.
OB: Label font size change does not impact the label height.
EB: After modifying the font size of a label, the label height should be automatically adjusted to match the new font size.
SR:
1. Create a label with a specified font size.
2. Change the font size of the label.
3. Observe that the height of the label does not change to match the new font size.
